River

Join

Memphis River Parks Partnership works with and for the people of Memphis to trigger the transformative power of our river.

The riverfront hosts regular programs, one-off activations and seasonal happenings. See what’s coming soon to the riverfront here.

View Events

Host your next event at the river.

There are many options to host weddings, birthday parties, family reunions and more at the riverfront. We charge rental fees based on the impact to the park and to the public.
